title: Is Billie Eilish the best female singer of our generation right now? - Quora

response.answer_text: (Were you being serious? I sure hope not. But I’ll give you an answer anyway)   Objectively speaking, she is far from it. Or at least based on what she’s shown us so far. I’m gonna list everything impressive about her singing: She has good breath controlShe has a good rangeShe has alright techniqueWhy she’s not the best: She can’t project her voice very wellHer voice isn’t versatileShe lacks powerOr at least this is based off of what I’ve seen. She also hasn’t reallly experimented that much which you’d think she woulda done by now. There are many artists who can do so much better at all these things. (Ariana Grande, Demi Lovato and Jessie J all come to mind). (Keep in mind, I’m not a vocal coach of any sort. This is just based off of knowledge I’ve picked it from Vocal Coach REACTS videos of my favourite singers)  Anyway thanks for reading :) (I do not own this image, thank Google Images)

Umm I’m gonna say no. Only because I think she has a particular way that it’s not for everyone. I’m not depressed or anything so her songs kind of just creep me out and I know a lot of adults who feel the same way that there kind of just so slow and strange that it’s hard to like.
